hero.description: Hey! is the ultimate Agntix Agency template for professionals in the design industry.
hero.avatarQuote: The depth of exploration and quality of the work was great

about.subtitle: WHO WE ARE
about.description: An independent web design and branding agency in Manchester set up in 2010 who care, build relationships, have industry experience, and win awards.
about.secondaryText: Driven by a passion for innovation, we specialize in delivering top-quality design solutions

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Whether you need stunning visuals for your website, captivating graphics for your marketing materials, or innovative UI/UX designs for your app, our team of experts is here to turn your vision into reality.

services.title: Product Design
services.description: Our product design services focus on creating intuitive and aesthetically pleasing products that resonate with your audience and stand out in the market.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: From website development and e-commerce platforms to custom software and mobile apps, our development team has the expertise to bring your ideas to life.

services.title: Branding
services.description: It's the core of your company's identity. It guides all business decisions, ensuring a consistent and impactful presence in the market.

seo.title: Home - Agntix Digital Agency & Creative Portfolio NextJs Template
seo.description: Agntix is the ultimate digital agency and creative portfolio template for professionals in the design industry.
